trans-unit.source: Specifies the value to pass to a property to cause the property to get its value from another source.
trans-unit.target: 指定要傳遞至屬性的值，讓屬性從其他來源取得其值。

trans-unit.source: This is known as *ambience*.
trans-unit.target: 這稱為「環境」。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: If a property on a control has ambient behavior, this attribute must be present.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制項上的屬性有環境的行為，則必須有這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Ambient properties query their parent for their value, for example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性，例如查詢它們的值，其父系、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a visual designer uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute> attribute to decide which value to persist for a property.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，會使用視覺化設計工具中<xref:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute>屬性來決定要保存為屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This is usually a value that causes the property to get its value from another source.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是會導致要從其他來源取得其值之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An example of an ambient value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the ambient value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，環境的值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>做為環境值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you have a control on a form and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the control is set to a different color than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the form, you can reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the control to that of the form by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> of the control to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有在表單上的控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>控制項的屬性設定為與不同的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>表單的屬性，您可以重<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>藉由設定表單的控制項屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>的若要控制<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using <xref:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute> to enforce ambient behavior for a property called `AlertForeColor`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute>來強制執行環境屬性的行為稱為`AlertForeColor`。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form 控制項中套用的屬性](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a Boolean value for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為 Boolean 值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given an 8-bit unsigned integer for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為 8 位元不帶正負號的整數 (Unsigned Integer)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a Unicode character for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a double-precision floating-point number for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為雙精度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a 16-bit signed integer for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a 32-bit signed integer for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a 64-bit signed integer for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given an object for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為物件。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a single-precision floating point number for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given a string for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定其值為字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <c>value</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The value for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> class, given the value and its type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，需指定值和型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using <xref:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute> to enforce ambient behavior for a property called `AlertForeColor`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute>來強制執行環境屬性的行為稱為`AlertForeColor`。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form 控制項中套用的屬性](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is the value of this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，其為這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the value of this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，為這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute" /> 的值。
